references: T. P. Martin, Shells of atoms, Phys. Reports, 273 (1996), 199-241, eq. (11).
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=0,...,1000
prog: (PARI) { for (n=0, 1000, write("b062025.txt", n, " ", n*(13*n^2 - 7)/6) ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 29 2009]
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Aug 02 2001
